label: logicA:politics_en
steps: [1] If the bill passes committee, then it reaches the floor.
[2] If the bill reaches the floor, then it is scheduled for a vote.
[3] For every legislator x, if x violates the ethics rules, then x is formally investigated.
[4] Senator Lee violates the ethics rules.
[6] The bill reaches the floor (from [1] and [5]).
[7] The bill is scheduled for a vote (from [2] and [6]).
[8] Senator Lee is formally investigated (from [3] and [4]).
[9] The bill is scheduled for a vote and Senator Lee is formally investigated (from [7] and [8]).
